item.title: It's Time To Admit Thunderbolts* Should've Been Called The New Avengers From The Start
item.description: Thunderbolts*' New Avengers twist and marketing were creative, but it created a few problems that didn't allow the movie to reach its full potential.

item.title: The New Palme d’Or Winner Has Been Revealed - Can It Repeat Anora’s Record-Breaking Success At The Oscars Next Year?
item.description: With the Palme d'Or winner chosen and several other high-profile Cannes debuts in the running, we take a look at how they could impact awards season.

item.title: I Love Arnold Schwarzenegger's Conan The Barbarian, But It Gets 1 Thing Wrong That's Always Bugged Me
item.description: As great as Conan the Barbarian may be, there's one major aspect of the 1982 Arnold Schwarzenegger movie that falls short of expectations.
